snippet.title: SCREAM 7 Official Super Bowl Trailer (2026)
snippet.description:
Official Scream 7 Movie Super Bowl Trailer 2026 | More ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App | Neve Campbell Movie Trailer | Cinema: 27 Feb 2026 | Details ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/movie/ykb/scream-7-2026?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description
When a new Ghostface killer emerges in the quiet town where Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) has built a new life, her darkest fears are realized as her daughter (Isabel May) becomes the next target. Determined to protect her family, Sidney must face the horrors of her past to put an end to the bloodshed once and for all.

Scream 7 (2026) is the new horror movie by Kevin Williamson & Christopher Landon, starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox and Isabel May.

Note | #Scream7 #Super Bowl Trailer courtesy of Paramount Pictures Germany. | All Rights Reserved. #KinoCheck®
